name: Style information for Pipple.
description: Contains look and feel, logo's and other information to make HTML files take the look and feel of the Pipple company.
---

# Pipple style skill

## Instructions
- Make sure the Pipple logo, conform ./Pipple_logo_v2.svg is shown in the upper left corner of the HTML.

- These are the colors:
```
{
    --primary-color: #575ad6;
    --primary-light: #7b7eff;
    --primary-dark: #4547b0;
    --text-white: #ffffff;
    --text-dark: #1a1a2e;
    --text-gray: #666680;
    --bg-light: #f5f5ff;
    --bg-white: #ffffff;
    --shadow-sm: 0 2px 10px rgba(87, 90, 214, 0.1);
    --shadow-md: 0 4px 20px rgba(87, 90, 214, 0.15);
    --shadow-lg: 0 10px 40px rgba(87, 90, 214, 0.2);
    --transition: all 0.3s ease;
    --border-radius: 12px;
    --border-radius-lg: 20px;
}
```

- And the font:

```
{
    font-family: 'Ubuntu', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: var(--text-light);
    line-height: 1.6;
    overflow-x: hidden;
}
```
